Name: Frequency of SW-Reviewer Declined immediately following SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Percentage of process variants containing at least one occurrence of SW-Reviewer Declined
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all cases

Name: Ratio of SW-Reviewer Declined to SW-Reviewer Agreed across the entire event log
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Number of times SW-Reviewer Declined occurs before a subsequent SW-AE Assign Reviewers in the same case
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' activities for cases where activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Declined that are followed within 7 days by another reviewer assignment attempt (SW-AE Assign Reviewers)

Name: Number of distinct cases in which SW-Reviewer Declined appears more than once
Percentage of SW-Reviewer Declined relative to the total number of all activity executions in the log

Name: Frequency of SW-Reviewer Declined in variants with performance duration above the median case duration

Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all cases where 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' does not happen
